# input
N, M = map(int, input().split())
A = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)]

# initialize
like_all = [True] * M

# check
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(1, A[i][0]+1):
        like_all[A[i][j]-1] = False

# count
print(sum(like_all))

# Get input
n, m = map(int, input().split())
foods = [[int(i) for i in input().split()[1:]] for _ in range(n)]

# Get the number of foods liked by all people
liked_by_all = 0
for i in range(1, m + 1):
    if all(i in food for food in foods):
        liked_by_all += 1

print(liked_by_all)

import sys

#read input
N, M = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

#initialize array
foods = [0] * M

#read input
for i in range(N):
    #read input
    K, *A = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    #update array
    for j in range(K):
        foods[A[j]-1] += 1

#output
print(foods.count(N))

N, M = map(int, input().split())

foods = [0] * M

for i in range(N):
    K = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for j in range(1, K[0] + 1):
        foods[K[j] - 1] += 1

print(foods.count(N))

import sys

N, M = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

likes = [0] * M

for _ in range(N):
    K = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    for k in K[1:]:
        likes[k-1] += 1

print(likes.count(N))
